summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.6°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13288 lux) and cloud levels (up 796 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15231 lux), cloud levels (up 1493 m), feels like temperature (up 5.6°C), and outside temperature (up 4.0°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1190.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
